comments: I took an online course with this professor: the experience was horrible. I felt like the professor was a tough grader and was partial. I will never take a class with this professor again.
This instructor does not help students, She is extremely slow to respond to email\'s, provide feedback and post grade. Be prepared for information overload!

She takes her job way to seriously, I would only recommend this professor if you are a reigion major, but if you are just taking this as a required class I would recommend finding a different professor

This is one of the worst classes I?ve ever taken because the professor was rude and disrespectful to all the students. She berated students who got wrong answers and tested on material never covered. More than a third of the students ended up dropping out because of her inability to work well with others.
